snippet: The engineering and construction company KBR lowered its 2012 earnings forecast, citing higher-than-expected project charges in its minerals and construction units.
abstract: KBR lowers its 2012 earnings forecast, citing higher-than-expected project charges in its minerals and construction units.
lead_paragraph: The engineering and construction company KBR lowered its 2012 earnings forecast, citing higher-than-expected project charges in its minerals and construction units.

headline.main: Kbr Lowers Profit Forecast, Sending Its Shares Down
headline.print_headline: KBR Lowers Profit Forecast, Sending Its Shares Down
